com.stripe.android

Class PayWithGoogleUtils

  • com.stripe.android.PayWithGoogleUtils

  • public class PayWithGoogleUtils

    Public utility class for common Pay with Google-related tasks.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static PayWithGoogleUtils INSTANCE

        Public utility class for common Pay with Google-related tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • getPriceString

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.lang.String getPriceString(int price,
                                                                   @NotNull
                                                                   java.util.Currency currency)

        Converts an integer price in the lowest currency denomination to a Google string value. For instance: (100L, USD) -> "1.00", but (100L, JPY) -> "100".

        Parameters:
        price - the price in the lowest available currency denomination
        currency - the Currency used to determine how many digits after the decimal
        Returns:
        a String that can be used as a Pay with Google price string
